_header: Hail be Thou Mary the mother of Christ
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: Ave regina celorum — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc), each with Latin final line

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Hayle be thow mary moder of crystHayle be thou blessed þat
                    bare a child…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…for me & all crystyn thow prayPro salute
                    fideliumExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).

             Anglia
         26 (1903): 94-285: 165-6.
Dyboski,  R.,
                        ed.  
             Songs, Carols and Other Miscellaneous Poems from Balliol MS. 354,
                Richard Hill’s Commonplace Book.
EETS
          e.s. 101 (1908); repr. 1984: 59-60.

CamTCC652.First Lines: Hayll mary the mod[ ]and hayll the bles[ ]…
CamTCC652.Last Lines:
…hall that Gabryell on [ ]Saynge Aue regina celi [
                    ]

Lam853.First Lines:
HEil be þou marie þe modir of cristHeil þe
                    blessidist þat euere bare childHeil þat conceyuedist al wiþ
                    listÞe sone of god boþe meeke & mylde…
Lam853.Last Lines:
…Heil cheefest of chastite for soþe to sayLady kepe vs so
                    in oure last dayÞat we may come to þi kingdomFor me &
                    alle cristen þou prayPro salute fidelum Amen
Lam853.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Hymns to the Virgin and Christ…and other religious poems.
EETS
         o.s. 24 (1867); repr. 1973: 4-5.

NLS1931.First Lines:
Heyle be þu mary þo moder of clrysteHeyle be
                    þo bleste þat euer bare chylde…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…for hus and for all odur þu preyEt pro salute
                        fidelium

TCD516.First Lines:
Haile be þu maide modir of cristhaile be þu blessidest
                    þat euer bare childe…
TCD516.Last Lines:
…ffor me and al cristen þu praypro salute
                    fidelium
